jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Responsible to apply best practices in User Experience design especially in website
● Co-create solution with the team from creating IA, user flow, low fidelity, high fidelity and prototype
● Designing a solution based on valid data and problem
● Support researcher by conducting qualitative and quantitative research
● Create design specs for responsive Web for a variety of devices and interfaces / DLS (Design Language System)
● Work with Asphalt design system
● Deliver the best and optimize version of the design to developers
● Designing and prototyping micro interaction
● Demonstrate attention to detail and understanding of typography, color and layout principles.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Had experience creating atomic design, design system, design token and able to create great documentations
  • Know the best practice to create responsive typography and responsive design in web
  • Deep understanding of design methodologies, principles, excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Proficient in related design tools such as Sketch, Figma or Adobe creative suite
  • Proficient in related Prototyping tools like Principle, Framer.JS or Webflow
  • 2-3+ years experience as a UI/UX designer, product design, UX architect in web and mobile products
  • Have a growth mindset , hungry to learn and curious
  • Have great listening skills, with an open-minded and team-oriented approach to design
  • Professional fluency in Bahasa Indonesia and English.
